short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Courses, Lectures and Video time information, Bookmarks, Progress tracker, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an additional functionality for https://investpro.bg. 

Here are the list of features: 
- On all courses page adds progress bar and time information for all courses in the program at the top
- On all courses page adds progress bar and time information for each course 
- In selected course page adds progress bar and time information for all videos at the top (You can complete or restart the progress)
- In selected course page for each lecture adds progress bar and time information for all videos in the lecture (You can complete or restart the progress)
- In selected course page for each video adds progress bar and time information (You can complete or restart the progress)
- Show popup after a video completes to automatically start the next video in the course
- Every video will start from where it was left off
- In selected course page adds a bookmarks section. Users can create/update/delete bookmarks and start a video from it.
